extendedInfo.description: *****WILD BINGO is the NEW #1 Bingo app played by everyone!*****Brought to you by Dragonplay â the social gaming experts and creators of Dragonplay Poker and Slot City - Wild Bingo is the only fast-paced action packed bingo app that takes you on an adventure across time! From the Wild West to medieval castles to the groovy sixties and more, Wild Bingo takes you on a wild journey of great bingo action, lots of prizes, auto daubs, bonus spots, gift spots and power-ups! Play on your Android smartphones & tablets.A non-stop joyride of fun, excitement and prizes awaits you at Wild Bingo, where youâll earn coins, rewards, collectibles, and achievements as you unlock more and more games!Use exciting POWER-UPS to get double XP points, extra bonus & gift spots!*****Experience REAL-TIME MULTIPLAYER GAMING*****Play for free with millions of Bingo enthusiasts and competitors like yourself from all over the world! Enjoy a Vegas-style casino environment and fast-paced bingo right on your smartphone or tablet.While playing, enjoy an in-game chat with your fellow players while daubing (or auto-daubing) your Bingo cards, take a spin on our NEW slot machines, win WILD jackpots and check our leaderboards to review your gameplay progress!POWER-UPS: Boost up your winning chances with a wide variety of power-ups to win more Bingos, gather more XP points, and move your way up Wild Bingoâs ranking scale!PLAY ANYWHEREOn the go with your mobile, with friends from all over the globe!Game Features:â¢ Real-time and multiplayer Bingoâ¢ New Slot roomsâ¢ Play up to 4 cards at onceâ¢ Amazing graphics!â¢ Themed rooms: Gold Rush, Jurassic Island, Treasure Knights and moreâ¢ Mini slot gamesâ¢ Personal avatarsâ¢ Free daily coinsâ¢ Facebook connect for fast registration (optional)â¢ Save to SD cardClick HERE to try out other exciting Dragonplay gaming apps!Live Hold'em Poker Pro â http://bit.ly/ABAXveLive Holdâem for Facebook - http://bit.ly/1aKxk2iSlot City â http://bit.ly/H0DZdh

reviews.title: Clemsongal
reviews.comment: Best bingo game that I\'ve found & played. Fun & love it!!! The other games you win once in a while. This one you win every game or odds like 3 to 5.
reviews.author: Karen Johnson

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: So far so good....  Really a good game .. Easy to play and win .. Nice for a change.
reviews.author: Jo Erwin

reviews.title: Addicting but...
reviews.comment: Well it\'s about time you receive 40 coins on a win! Now to make this game better I notice that we are winning more coins on the Ferris wheel spin!!  I love this game...it\'s the best bingo game out there & hopefully it will only get better! Thanks Dragon play!
reviews.author: Joanne Franceschina

reviews.title: Awesome game. Simple qnd user friendly application
reviews.comment: Love it.
reviews.author: Patrick Eschete

reviews.title: Fun--revised
reviews.comment: Lots of fun.  Faster pace than others and fun little slots game to play while waiting. Game started out really great.  But I soon found out that the diamonds you use to for \"power up\" have to be bought or won on the prize wheel. Have never won any and won\'t pay money to get them.
reviews.author: janice Smith

reviews.title: I love playing bingo! This one is busy in a good way
reviews.comment: Its a fun bingo, busy and competitive as enjoyable play
reviews.author: Danette Koma

reviews.title: Dragon Play is awesome!
reviews.comment: They have the best games. I think I have downloaded them all. They are great fun and the give you daily perks, how great is that! Highly recommend!!!
reviews.author: Deborah Apostolou

reviews.comment: Good game! Better than Bingo Blast. Doesn\'t freeze like Bingo Blast. Thankfully I found a good one!\tFinally I found a great bingo game to play that don\'t freeze and that\'s not a waste of time.
reviews.author: Dawn Eringi

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Great game.  Announcer is clear and easy to understand.  Not to fast and not to slow.  Site will shut down by that\'s not to often.  Good free game.
reviews.author: Michele Houston

reviews.title: Good but can be better
reviews.comment: Good bingo app, the daily bonus sucks. You get 50 coins plus a little extra for rank and friends and a free spin on the bonus wheel. Unless you hit it big on the wheel don\'t expect to play for very long. Only way to make coins is to be top 3 or buy coins. Should be able to gift coins to friends and bump up the daily bonus to 500 instead of 50.
reviews.author: jack jodway

reviews.title: Awesome....
reviews.comment: Great app...awesome game, can\'t wait for next allocation to play again. Would be nice to receive credits more than once daily, otherwise great game.
reviews.author: Annie Mea

reviews.title: great game for bingo lovers
reviews.comment: Game is fun, easy to play, wish diamonds were easier to get but all in all would recommend this to any one who likes to play bingo
reviews.author: Kathy Johnson

reviews.title: This game sucks
reviews.comment: Will act like its going into a game and then stop and in the mean time it takes your money and you didnt even play. Did this to me 4 times today.
reviews.author: Jennifer Schark

reviews.title: Super Fun! But.....
reviews.comment: The payouts stink for what u pay to play!!! Hardly given chance to achieve collections, i.e. golden boards
reviews.author: Heather Dann

reviews.title: Ok game
reviews.comment: I never seem to get a bingo no matter how many cards I play. The closest I get is a bingo on the last ball but someone always gets it before me. Very frustrating
reviews.author: shaneal jernigan

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: This game has great graphics and is totally addicting. No freezes and lots of play options without spending too much cash.
reviews.author: Lori Chatham

reviews.title: Not my favorite
reviews.comment: It\'s a little more difficult to use than other BINGO games. Not as user friendly.
reviews.author: Lauren Marston

reviews.comment: It\'s a good game and worth downloading. The dailey bonus could be bigger but its like playing in the bingo halls because of the patterns.
reviews.author: Danielle Crossland

reviews.comment: The update was good to recieve more coins per win. I love this game. I play every day but almost never win big in the daily spin. It would be nice to place in the top three sometimes also. Otherwise, it is a fun game!\tGreat game!
reviews.author: Lisa Callari

reviews.comment: Frustrating to me that I never win bingos and my free spin each day earns me only enough coins to play the cheapest card.
reviews.author: Jill Smith
